body_html:
@soumith (Finally) got round to opening a PR on this: #2580

My plan is to add col2im into the same im2col.cu and im2col.py files and then add separate files for row2col and vol2col. Seems more straightforward than a monolithic unfolding layer - but happy to go down that route if preferred too.

body:
@soumith (Finally) got round to opening a PR on this: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2580

My plan is to add col2im into the same im2col.cu and im2col.py files and then add separate files for row2col and vol2col.  Seems more straightforward than a monolithic unfolding layer - but happy to go down that route if preferred too.
